evidence.text: for all the reasons stated on the record on June 16, 2025, plaintiffs are entitled to judgment

evidence.location: Page 2, section following "It is therefore ORDERED, ADJUDGED, and DECREED that:"
evidence.text: Thus, the Challenged Directives as a whole are void, illegal, and of no force and effect and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

I.  The Challenged Directives as a whole are arbitrary and capricious in violation of 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A).  Thus, the Challenged Directives as a whole are void, illegal, and of no force and effect and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

extracted.value: The Challenged Directives as a whole are vacated and set aside pursuant to 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A).

evidence.text: II.  The Resulting Grant Terminations are arbitrary and capricious in violation

extracted.value: The Resulting Grant Terminations are vacated and set aside.

evidence.text: III. Judgment shall enter in favor of plaintiffs and against defendants on Count 3 of the Amended Complaint.

extracted.value: Judgment shall enter in favor of plaintiffs and against defendants on Count 3 of the Amended Complaint.
